title: How will you ever deal with "Smart trolls"
body:
In one of my recent matches I ran into two Intentional Feeders, 
I didnt come to this viewpoint lightly, I watched them die multiple times going 
all in on their lane and dying, rinse repeat.

Both very evasive about if there new, or why they keep running into certain death.

Score is about 10 vs 40 at this point.

They both vote no to any surrender attempts, forcing us to keep playing.

All of a sudden they started playing quite well, flanking, playing smart,
trading quite well, very opportunistic to take any kills as well.

I think one went from 0/10 to finish at 4/11.

Now these guys we're very careful about what they said, and didnt afk,
so whats going to happen, How's the automated system going to 
pick up these guys gave bottom lane 10-15 early game kills and then just
put in a little work at the end to look good?


Honestly, you think you've seen the worst kind of toxic league has to offer, 
and then you find a new low.

I'd keep an eye on this guys account but he wont get banned, so
its just depressing.

PS. Bonus the guys account name has "Feed" in it.

replies.body:
This is the fault of automated systems; they can always be exploited. I miss the days of manual reviewing, even though not as many people were being banned. It was a lot more accurate.

The best thing you can do is just report at the end of the game, and if enough people report them for intentionally feeding, they'll be penalised (following usual procedure).

You can [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like to create a more detailed report. Otherwise, you've done all that can be done.
